id.description: Unique ID of the holding record

hrid.description: the human readable ID, also called eye readable ID. A system-assigned sequential ID which maps to the Instance ID

holdingsTypeId.description: unique ID for the type of this holdings record

callNumber.description: Call Number is an identifier assigned to an item, usually printed on a label attached to the item.

permanentLocationId.description: The permanent shelving location in which an item resides.

discoverySuppress.description: records the fact that the record should not be displayed in a discovery system
